short_summary: Supply of electrical transformers to the CCGS Earl Grey.
description: The Department of Fisheries & Oceans has a requirement to procure electrical transformers to replace the existing transformers currently fitted on the CCGS Earl Grey.

================.fromStringbins(in)
### Government Tender Announcement: Procurement of Electrical Transformers

#### Tender Details
| **Category** | **Details** |
| --- | --- |
| Title | Procurement of Electrical Transformers for CCGS Earl Grey |
| Reference Number | WS4104373587-Doc4106378264 |
| Amendment Number | 2 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4104373587 |
| Publication Date | 21-Jul-2023 |

#### Key Dates
| **Category** | **Details** |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Closing Date | 15-Aug-2023, 14:00:00 ET |
| Amendment Date | 15-Aug-2023 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 25-Aug-2023 |
| Expected Contract End Date | NA |

#### Procurement Details
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia

#### Contract Details
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entities: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) / Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)

#### Contact Information
* Name: Grant, Jonathan (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: jonathan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16942903?extsite=MTY5NDI5MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

#### Tender Description
The Department of Fisheries & Oceans has a requirement to procure electrical transformers to replace the existing transformers currently fitted on the CCGS Earl Grey. The electrical transformers must meet the specified technical requirements and be in compliance with applicable regulations.

Note to Buyer: Please ensure that the transformers meet the requirements outlined in the tender documentation. 

### Important Links
* *Ariba Discovery page*: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16942903?extsite=MTY5NDI5MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* *Contractor’s homepage (not included)*
